solution_line_template: Kaiden collects {cans_first_week} cans his first week and {cans_second_week} cans during the second week. {cans_first_week} + {cans_second_week} = <<{cans_first_week}+{cans_second_week}={total_collected_cans}>>{total_collected_cans} cans of soup
Kaiden wants to collect a total of {goal_cans} cans, so he still needs {goal_cans} - {total_collected_cans} = <<{goal_cans}-{total_collected_cans}={cans_needed}>>{cans_needed} cans of soup
